description: A schema representing the definition file for an Ultra Project

name.description: The name of the Ultra Project

description.description: The description of the Ultra Project

version.description: The version of the Ultra Project

scripts.description: All scripts contained within the Ultra project. Scripts in the Ultra scope will be run against every solution. Consider these "global"

additionalProperties.description: The name of the script and the command it runs against every solution and project

macros.description: All macros contained within the Ultra project. Macros are simply commands that can be executed within the Ultra project. Think of these like scripts in Node's package.json

additionalProperties.description: The name of the macro and the command it executes

projects.description: All projects contained within the solution

items.description: A single project within the solution

name.description: The name of the project, not necessarily the identifier

identifier.description: The actual name of the dotnet project as it is within the solution

scripts.description: All scripts contained within the project. Scripts within the project are run only against the project

additionalProperties.description: The name of the script and the command it executes

scripts.description: All scripts contained within the solution. Scripts within the solution are run against the entire solution

additionalProperties.description: The name of the script and the command it executes
